NAME: Amer Fort
COMMENT: Kachwaha Dynasty; Raja Man Singh I; UNESCO Hill Fort; Sheesh Mahal.

NAME: Mehrangarh Fort
COMMENT: Rao Jodha (1459); Rathore clan; Chokhelao Bagh; Phool Mahal.

NAME: Jaisalmer Fort
COMMENT: Rawal Jaisal; "Sonar Quila"; Trikuta Hill; Living fort.

NAME: Chittorgarh Fort
COMMENT: Largest fort in India; Mewar capital; Vijay Stambha; Jauhar site.

NAME: Kumbhalgarh Fort
COMMENT: Rana Kumbha; 36km long wall; Birthplace of Maharana Pratap.

NAME: Ranthambore Fort
COMMENT: Chauhan Dynasty; Sapaldaksha; Hammir Dev; UNESCO Hill Fort.

NAME: Gagron Fort
COMMENT: UNESCO site; "Jal Durg" (Water Fort); confluence of Ahu & Kali Sindh rivers.

NAME: Hawa Mahal
COMMENT: Sawai Pratap Singh; Lal Chand Usta (Architect); 953 Jharokhas.

NAME: City Palace
COMMENT: Maharana Udai Singh II; Lake Pichola bank; Mewar architecture.

NAME: Jantar Mantar
COMMENT: Sawai Jai Singh II; UNESCO site; Vrihat Samrat Yantra sundial.

NAME: Jal Mahal
COMMENT: Man Sagar Lake; Sawai Pratap Singh; Rajput-Mughal style.

NAME: Junagarh Fort
COMMENT: Raja Rai Singh; built on plains (not hilltop); Anup Mahal.

NAME: Bhatner Fort
COMMENT: Oldest fort in region; Raja Bhupat (Bhati); repelled Timur.

NAME: Adhai Din Ka Jhonpra
COMMENT: Qutub-ud-din Aibak; converted Sanskrit college; Indo-Islamic.

NAME: Taragarh Fort
COMMENT: Rao Deva; Chhatra Mahal; famous for murals; Garbh Gunjam cannon.

NAME: Vijay Stambha
COMMENT: Rana Kumbha (1448); victory over Malwa/Gujarat; 9 storeys.

NAME: Kirti Stambha
COMMENT: Dedicated to Rishabhanatha (1st Jain Tirthankara); 12th century.

NAME: Jaswant Thada
COMMENT: Taj Mahal of Marwar; cenotaph for Maharaja Jaswant Singh II.

NAME: Chand Baori
COMMENT: King Chanda (Nikumbha Dynasty); world's deepest stepwell.

NAME: Nahargarh Fort
COMMENT: Sawai Jai Singh II; "Abode of Tigers"; Madhavendra Bhawan.

NAME: Jaigarh Fort
COMMENT: Sawai Jai Singh II; Victory Fort; Jaivana (largest cannon on wheels).

NAME: Dilwara Temples
COMMENT: Vimal Shah/Vastupal-Tejpal; Maru-Gurjara style; Marble carvings.

NAME: Raniji ki Baori
COMMENT: Rani Nathavati; "Queen's Stepwell"; intricate carvings.

NAME: Umaid Bhawan Palace
COMMENT: Maharaja Umaid Singh; Chittar sandstone; Indo-Deco style.

NAME: Patwon Ki Haveli
COMMENT: Guman Chand Patwa; cluster of 5 havelis; yellow sandstone.

NAME: Brahma Temple
COMMENT: Only major temple dedicated to Brahma; near Pushkar Lake.

NAME: Lohagarh Fort
COMMENT: Maharaja Surajmal (Jat ruler); "Iron Fort"; impregnable mud walls.

NAME: Kiradu Temples
COMMENT: Khajuraho of Rajasthan; Solanki style; dedicated to Shiva.

NAME: Abhaneri Stepwell
COMMENT: Harshat Mata Temple complex; 8th-9th century AD.

NAME: Tanot Mata Temple
COMMENT: Bhati Rajput lineage; managed by BSF; Indo-Pak war 1965 significance.
